section.title: companies master list of Companies
section.para: To access the master list of Companies, select the "Companies" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Companies" screen displays information on all existing Companies, including Company number and Company description.

note.para: The use of Companies can be enabled or disabled by default at the system level.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Opens screen for creating a new Company.

Enables you to edit highlighted Company. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Company--except that when editing, the fields will contain Company information. Double-clicking on a Company will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Company and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Company and then select this button to remove the Company from the list.
